solution.text:
Given numbers are :
_{{(pow(2,i))*(pow(3,(j+2)))*(pow(5,k))}}_ and _{{(pow(2,(i+2)))*(pow(3,j))*(pow(5,(1+k)))}}_
Factorizing the given no.s as follows:
_{{(pow(2,i))*(pow(3,(j+2)))*(pow(5,k))}}_ = \(2^_{i}_\times 3^{_{{j+2}}_}\times 5^_{k}_\)
_{{(pow(2,(2+i)))*(pow(3,j))*(pow(5,(1+k)))}}_ = \(2^{_{{2+i}}_}\times 3^_{j}_\times 5^{_{{1+k}}_}\)
Then,
HCF of the given no.s is = \(2^_{i}_\times 3^_{j}_\times 5^_{k}_\)
LCM of the given no.s is = \(2^{_{{2+i}}_}\times 3^{_{{2+j}}_}\times 5^{_{{1+k}}_}\)

content.text:
Find the LCM and HCF of the given numbers by applying the prime factorization method.
_{{(pow(2,i))*(pow(3,(j+2)))*(pow(5,k))}}_ and _{{(pow(2,(i+2)))*(pow(3,j))*(pow(5,(1+k)))}}_
